resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/598395821</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>598395821</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770211598</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Plate Tectonic Animations</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Platte Tectonic Animationen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Animations Tectoniques de Plat</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Animations Tectonic Da Placa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Animazioni Tettoniche Della Piastra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τεκτονικές ζωτικότητες πιάτων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Animaciones Tectónicas De la Placa</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This site contains a variety of plate tectonic animations, paleogeographic reconstructions, and paleoclimate animations. Each animation is viewable from the web page, and has accompanying text that explains the events portrayed. Examples include the formation of the ocean basins, the assembly and breakup of Pangaea, and the collision of India and Asia.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Site enthält eine Vielzahl Platte der 
tectonic Animationen, der paläogeographischen Rekonstruktionen und 
der paleoclimate Animationen. Jede Animation ist von der 
Webseite viewable und hat das Begleiten des Textes, der die 
geschilderten Fälle beschreibt. Beispiele schließen die 
Anordnung der Ozeanbassins, des Zusammenbaus und des Auseinanderbrechens 
von Pangaea und des Zusammenstoßes von Indien und von Asien ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce site contient une variété d'animations 
tectoniques de plat, de reconstructions paléogéographiques, et 
d'animations de paleoclimate. Chaque animation est visualisable 
de la page Web, et a accompagner le texte qui explique les 
événements dépeints. Les exemples incluent la formation des 
bassins d'océan, l'assemblage et la dissolution de Pangaea, et la 
collision de l'Inde et de l'Asie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este local contem uma variedade de animations 
tectonic da placa, de reconstructions paleogeographic, e de animations
do paleoclimate. Cada animation é viewable do Web page, e tem 
acompanhar o texto que explica os eventos portrayed. Os exemplos
incluem a formação das bacias do oceano, o conjunto e o breakup de 
Pangaea, e a colisão de India e de Ásia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo luogo contiene una varietà di animazioni 
tettoniche della piastra, di ricostruzioni paleogeographic e di 
animazioni del paleoclimate. Ogni animazione è viewable dal Web
page ed ha accompagnare il testo che spiega gli eventi ritratti. 
Gli esempi includono la formazione dei bacini dell'oceano, il 
montaggio ed il disfacimento di Pangaea e lo scontro dell'India e 
dell'Asia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η περιοχή περιέχει ποικίλες τεκτονικές 
ζωτικότητες πιάτων, paleogeographic αναδημιουργίες, και 
paleoclimate τις ζωτικότητες. Κάθε ζωτικότητα είναι 
viewable από ιστοσελίδας, και έχει το συνοδευτικό κείμενο που 
εξηγεί τα γεγονότα που απεικονίζονται. Τα παραδείγματα 
περιλαμβάνουν το σχηματισμό των ωκεάνιων λεκανών, της συμβολικής 
γλώσσας και της αποσύνθεσης Pangaea, και της σύγκρουσης της 
Ινδίας και της Ασίας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este sitio contiene una variedad de animaciones 
tectónicas de la placa, de reconstrucciones paleogeográficas, y de 
animaciones del paleoclimate. Cada animación es viewable del 
Web page, y tiene acompañamiento del texto que explica los 
acontecimientos retratados. Los ejemplos incluyen la formación 
de los lavabos del océano, el ensamblaje y la desintegración de 
Pangaea, y la colisión de la India y de Asia.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:CHRIS SCOTESE
FN:CHRIS SCOTESE
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770211598</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>598395821</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/plate-tectonic-animations</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
